author: jgm
content: Interesting edge case: if a validator has an effective balance of 31ETH, it will struggle to get back to an effective balance of 32ETH due to skimming.  If it gets luck and proposes (or is in a sync committee) it will have enough balance to tick up the effective balance, but otherwise most likely not so it will be stuck at 31ETH until that happens.

author: jgm
content: (And actually proposals and sync committees are probably not going to be enough by themselves either, so any validator whose effective balance falls below 32ETH is very likely to stay there.)
